title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 168 - State Schools And Centers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 168 - State Schools And Centers

State Regulations
§ 168.1 - Discipline of children
§ 168.2 - Standards relating to the use of room confinement
§ 168.3 - Use of physical and medical restraints
§ 168.4 - Group confinement
§ 168.5 - Powers and duties of the boards of visitors
§ 168.6 - Reporting to counsel's office
§ 168.7 - Confidentiality of Office of Children and Family Services records
§ 168.8 - Group punishment

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 168

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-G, §§
500, 501, 510

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
